data.text:
Very nice hotel, the staff were very efficient and friendly. Good location, so easy to walk everywhere from the hotel.
Our room was clean and spacious.
We had a car and the hotel has parking. 
We liked the spa although the pool was a bit small so more of a plunge pool than one you can swim in.
We would recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Barcelona.
data.title: Nice hotel, with friendly and helpful staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 

First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay in Barcelona and for your evaluation of it. 
Thank you very much for your comments about the attention provided by our staff, location, cleanliness of rooms and parking and spa service. 
We look forward to your next visit. 
Best regards. 
Marcos Trueba 
Hotel Manager
owner_response.author: Marcos T

data.text: The hotel was an ideal location for us going to Barca Fest at Poble Espanyol then on to the game at Lluis Company Stadium & walking back downhill all the way. It was close to Las Ramblas & Montjuïc Castle vía funicular & teleféric. All staff friendly & we both received gifts for our birthdays during our stay. Urban deluxe rooms very comfortable & clean with plenty of toiletries supplied. We ate dinner in restaurant one evening & enjoyed carbonara/Greek salad. The highlight of our stay was the spa with hydro massage which was the perfect remedy for our legs each day after covering all those miles seeing the sights of the city.
data.title: Best birthdays Barcelona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear guest, 

First of all, we would like to thank you for choosing our Hotel for your stay in Barcelona and for the subsequent evaluation of the same. 
We are glad to know that our location for the purpose of your trip was to your liking, as well as the treatment received from our staff, details of birthday and spa. 

We look forward to your next visit. 
Best regards
owner_response.author: Marcos T

data.text:
A clean hotel and centrally located. Check-in was easy and the front desk spoke English which made things easier. Our room was clean, the bed was comfortable and we enjoyed our balcony on the 6th floor. Breakfast is available for additional cost on and we did this one of the mornings we were there. It is a full breakfast, offering a full coffee station to customize your coffee, fruit, eggs, a selection of proteins and even mimosas. 
It is close to several attractions and we were able to walk easily to Gothic center and up to Montjuic. Close to many restaurants and local cafe's for the days we didn't do breakfast at the hotel. They also offered us two welcome drinks from their bar. We unfortunately didn't have time to enjoy their spa, but I heard great things about it.
data.title: Clean, quiet, and centrally located.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you for your stay and review. 

Kind Regars.
owner_response.author: Marcos T

data.text:
Great location - around 15 mins walk from Les Rambles and the Port so central but in a quieter neighbourhood. 

Rooms were comfortable - oddly the sink is in the main bedroom rather than in the bathroom. Great overhead shower. Slippers, robe and hairdryer provided but no iron or ironing board in the room. 

Friendly staff and security. 

We had a massage in the spa which was brilliant. We prebooked and got 15% off. 

Overall a good base for a few days.
data.title: Good location 15 mins from Les Ramblas

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 

Thank you so much for yout review. 

Kind Regards
owner_response.author: Marcos T

data.text: Me and my husband planed to have a relaxing evening at the end of our stay in Barcelona and we decided staying to Grums with the hope of having a great room and good spa. Unfortunately the quality of the room is so poor, very old furniture and bad quality of sanitary equipment, bed and humid smell inside. The spa is very small. The hotel area is in the middle of a dark neighbourhood and doesn’t have the right view for a 4stars hotel. I given 2 stars for the staff because they were very nice with us. Very disappointed about this place.
data.title: Poor quality hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear guest, First of all we would like to thank you for your stay with us and for taking the time to evaluate it. We are glad to know that the treatment received by our staff, location and facilities were to your liking. On the other hand we regret that the room was not to your liking, usually both our rooms and our spa service are highly valued by our customers, we would also like to share with you that the maximum capacity of our Spa is 10 people, to avoid this overcrowding that you indicate. Best regards. Marcos Trueba. Hotel manager
owner_response.author: Marcos T
